name: Imagine: Animal Doctor
description:
Imagine being able to take care of your favorite furry friends ranging
from puppies and colts to pet rabbits and kittens. You are one of the
world's youngest and brightest pet vets, ready to help animals while
making their hospital a better place with new medical equipment and
expansion ideas. Interact with the animals by feeding, diagnosing and
treating, or just playing with them.
